column2: Become Independent
[This.GetTitledFirstName] desires independence from [This.GetHerHis] liege.
Fall in Love
[This.GetTitledFirstName] desires romance and passion.
Become a Friend to your Liege
[This.GetTitledFirstName] desires to befried [This.GetHerHis] liege.
Win the war
[This.GetTitledFirstName] desires to win the war.
I won the war!
This character has recently won a war.
Become a formidable fighter
[This.GetTitledFirstName] desires to become a formidable fighter.
Reign for 20 Years
[This.GetTitledFirstName] yearns to rule for twenty years.
Reign in Peace for 10 Years
[This.GetTitledFirstName] desires ten years of peace for his realm.
Has ruled in peace for §Y10§! years.
Lead Troops in Battle
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to prove his worth on the battlefield.
Gather Great Councillors
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to unite the greatest minds in the known world, and have them serve on [This.GetHerHis] council.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to improve [This.GetHerHis] Intrigue, since it is poor (lower than §Y10§!).
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to improve [This.GetHerHis] Diplomacy, since it is poor (lower than §Y10§!).
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to improve [This.GetHerHis] Learning, since it is poor (lower than §Y10§!).
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to improve [This.GetHerHis] Stewardship, since it is poor (lower than §Y10§!).
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to improve [This.GetHerHis] Martial ability, since it is poor (lower than §Y10§!).
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to see the authority of the §Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§! Religion strengthened, as it is currently below §Y30%§!.

To complete the ambition you need to perform §Y3§! of the following tasks:
 §Y*§! Construct a Temple
 §Y*§! Convert a Province to [This.Religion.GetName]
 §Y*§! Hold a Council of Theologists
Note that you can complete the same task multiple times.

Tasks currently completed: §G[This.strengthen_religion.GetValue]§!
Become Druid
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to improve [This.GetHerHis] learning and become a druid.
Become High [Root.GetKingQueen] of [This.Capital.Empire.GetName]

[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to become High [Root.GetKingQueen] of [This.Capital.Empire.GetName]. If tribal, this allows the unlimited use of the Subjugation Casus Belli against all other tribal rulers of the same culture group inside the high kingdom.
Is [Root.GetKingQueen] of [This.Capital.Empire.GetName]
Overthrow [From.Liege.GetTitle]
Overthrow [From.Liege.GetTitle]

Members desire §Y[From.GetBestName]§! as the new [From.Liege.GetTitle] of the §Y[This.GetFullName]§!. When sufficiently powerful, §Y[From.GetBestName]§! may present an ultimatum to §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!
Overthrow [Root.Liege.GetTitle]

Present an ultimatum to §Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!, demanding [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] to step down from the throne and install you as the new [Root.Liege.GetTitle]. If [Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun] refuses to comply, your faction will rise in revolt.
Plot for a new ruler of [This.GetBaseName]
